medical_history.chief_complaint: Crampy right upper quadrant abdominal pain radiating to back, associated with vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports a 2-day history of crampy abdominal pain, aggravated by increases in intraabdominal pressure. Pain does not correlate with meals and is not similar to her GERD pain. Vomiting occurred twice yesterday, non-bilious and non-bloody.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism, GERD, hyperlipidemia, hypertension. Previous right carotid endarterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of breast cancer, father with coronary artery disease.
